docs.name: Foreman
docs.info: Foreman API v2 is currently the default API version.

methods.name: index

apis.short_description: List all audits for a given host

examples:
GET /api/audits
200
{
  "total": 1,
  "subtotal": 1,
  "page": 1,
  "per_page": 20,
  "search": null,
  "sort": {
    "by": null,
    "order": null
  },
  "results": [
    {
      "user_id": null,
      "user_type": null,
      "user_name": null,
      "version": 1,
      "comment": null,
      "associated_id": 272,
      "associated_type": "Host",
      "remote_address": null,
      "associated_name": null,
      "created_at": "2009-12-14 08:01:17 UTC",
      "id": 980190962,
      "auditable_id": 980190962,
      "auditable_name": null,
      "auditable_type": "Host",
      "action": "update",
      "audited_changes": {
        "architecture_id": [
          10463,
          10466
        ]
      }
    }
  ]
}

methods.name: show

params.name: id
params.validator: Must be an identifier, string from 1 to 128 characters containing only alphanumeric characters, space, underscore(_), hypen(-) with no leading or trailing space.

examples:
GET /api/audits/980190962
200
{
  "user_id": null,
  "user_type": null,
  "user_name": null,
  "version": 1,
  "comment": null,
  "associated_id": 272,
  "associated_type": "Host",
  "remote_address": null,
  "associated_name": null,
  "created_at": "2009-12-14 08:01:17 UTC",
  "id": 980190962,
  "auditable_id": 980190962,
  "auditable_name": null,
  "auditable_type": "Host",
  "action": "update",
  "audited_changes": {
    "architecture_id": [
      10463,
      10466
    ]
  }
}
